div.h2: "Building a Foundation for Learning, Leadership & Life"
div.p: Skokie School District 73.5 has established a set of guiding principles. The principles represent the best thinking of District 73.5 staff, parents, students, and community members. These principles will continue to evolve as we grow and move forward.
